newsitem.title: USA: Procept names M. Weiss interim chairman.
newsitem.headline: Procept names M. Weiss interim chairman.

text.p: Procept Inc said Monday hat its board had elected Michael Weiss to the board as interim chairman.
Weiss is also the interim chairman of Genta Inc, and a director of AVAX Technologies Inc, Xytronyx Inc and Palatin Technologies Inc, each a publicly traded biotechnology company.
Procept is engaged in research and development of small molecule therapeutics for the prevention and treatment of chronic and life-threatening immune system disorders.
